        public static void addAppointment​(int appointmentID,
                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String description,
                                  java.lang.String location,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime startLDT,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime endLDT,
                                  java.sql.Timestamp createdDate,
                                  java.lang.String createdBy,
                                  java.sql.Timestamp lastUpdate,
                                  java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                  int customerID,
                                  int userID,
                                  int contactID)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is called by the addAppointment method in the MainScreen controller
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - the appointment ID
        title - the title
        description - the description
        location - the location
        type - the type
        startLDT - the start time
        endLDT - the end time
        createdDate - the date created
        createdBy - the person who created appointment
        lastUpdate - the date updated
        lastUpdatedBy - the person who updated appointment
        customerID - the customer ID
        userID - the user ID
        contactID - the contact ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if SQL error occurs
